Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and durability, it's truly a valuable asset. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $200. This is an opportunity to own a high-quality item that could save you time and effort in the long run. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
